article_title: Israel strikes southern Gaza city swollen with displaced people
sentence: Ten  people  in  a  house  sheltering  two  displaced  families  in  Rafah  were  among  135  people  killed  in  Israeli  strikes  over  the  past  24  hours,  Hamas-run  health  ministry  officials  said.

article_title: Israel strikes southern Gaza city swollen with displaced people
sentence: The  Israeli  military  said  it  had  hit  several  targets  there  and  killed  numerous  fighters.

article_title: Israel strikes southern Gaza city swollen with displaced people
sentence: The  IDF  also  said  it  had  killed  Hamas  fighters  in  Khan  Younis,  while  Hamas  said  it  had  fired  at  an  IDF  helicopter  near  the  city.

article_title: Israel strikes southern Gaza city swollen with displaced people
sentence: A  total  of  23,843  Palestinians,  mostly  civilians,  have  now  been  killed  in  Israel's  military  campaign  against  Hamas  in  Gaza,  the  Hamas-run  health  ministry  says.

article_title: Israel strikes southern Gaza city swollen with displaced people
sentence: Israel  launched  its  campaign  after  hundreds  of  Hamas  gunmen  infiltrated  southern  Israeli  communities  from  Gaza,  killing  about  1,200  people  and  taking  about  240  others  hostage.

article_title: Israel strikes southern Gaza city swollen with displaced people
sentence: Correction  10th  July  2024:  This  article  wrongly  reported  that  about  1,300  people  had  been  killed  following  the  7th  October  attack  by  Hamas.

article_title: Israel strikes southern Gaza city swollen with displaced people
sentence: This  was  based  on  counting  those  who  later  died  from  their  injuries  in  addition  to  the  figure  of  more  than  1,200.
